long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This closes all open tabs as soon as it opens them. To remove, navigate to %userprofile%\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default\Extensions (on Windows) or ~/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Default (on mac) and delete it in there. This is currently functional and will close active and inactive windows, deleting your session and creating difficulty in re-opening the browser. Please note, the extension requires the user to open a new tab after installation for the extension to trigger.
